DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability efficacy KP‑413 topical ointment compare vehicle ointment treat adult subject atopic dermatitis ( AD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Safety , Tolerability Efficacy KP‑413 Subjects With Atopic Dermatitis ( AD )
DOC.criteria: Has clear diagnosis AD meeting Hanifin Rajka criterion AD involve head/neck torso/limbs , affect 530 % subject 's total BSA determine use rule nine Has Baseline IGSS 3 ( moderate ) 4 ( severe ) select treatment area torso/limbs , Baseline IGSS 2 ( mild ) , 3 ( moderate ) 4 ( severe ) select treatment area head/neck . Female childbearing potential negative pregnancy test use effective method contraception study . Female pregnant , nursing infant , plan pregnancy study period . Has Baseline oozing/crusting score 3 ( moderate ) great select treatment area head/neck torso/limbs . Presence concurrent skin condition could interfere assessment treatment . Treatment investigational drug device within 30 day 5 half life ( whichever longer ) prior Baseline visit , concurrent participation another clinical trial investigational drug device .
